coded_answer.p: I am writing to you because I am very glad forabout my first place in the competition,. I am going to tell you about the things that you ask me about onin your letter.

AccommodationRegarding accommodation at camp, I would like to choose cabins because I think I would be protected from the animals and the cold.

Furthermore, for the activities I want to select Tennis and Basketball because I haveshave been playing tennis since I was young and basketball because I played for the team in my college likeas the capitancaptain.
I want to ask you one more thing. I do not have any idea about how much money and clothesclothing I have to bring would. Would you give me ansome advice to knowabout how much I need to bring
I look forward to heardhearing from you

I'm writing to you to tell you about my experience when I was helping at a pop concert, well. Well first let me tell you that my job was helping the artistartists if they needneeded something, for example givegiving them water or snacks.

any wayAnyway, this was my own experience working at the concert, if. If you have anyan oportunityopportunity to help at any concert you should help because you have a lot of fun as well, okOK.
